data.text:
Marie-Thérèse de la Poëze d'Harambure1

F, #111731, b. 5 June 1911, d. 19 April 2005

Last Edited=31 May 2005

Marie-Thérèse de la Poëze d'Harambure was born on 5 June 1911. She was the daughter of Jean de la Poëze d'Harambure, Marquis d'Harambure. She married, firstly, Guillaume le Verdier on 16 June 1934. She married, secondly, Henri René Marie de Belzunce-Castelmauron, Marquis de Belzunce on 31 March 1940. She married, thirdly, Erik Karl Auguste Hedwige Englebert Antoine Balthasar XI Herzog von Arenberg, son of Engelbert IX Herzog von Arenberg and Princess Hedwige de Ligne, on 20 August 1949. She died on 19 April 2005 at age 93 at Punta del Este, Uruguay .2

From 16 June 1934, her married name became le Verdier. From 31 March 1940, her married name became de Belzunce. Her married name became von Arenberg.

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S213] Unknown author, "unknown article title," European Royal History Journal: volume 8.2, page 32.

Sigismund Otto Erzherzog von Österreich1

M, #111732, b. 21 April 1966

Last Edited=5 Sep 2016

Sigismondo, Archduke of Austria 2

Sigismund Otto Erzherzog von Österreich was born on 21 April 1966 at Lausanne, Switzerland .1 He is the son of Leopold Franz Erzherzog von Österreich and Laetitia Marie Madelaine Susanne Valentine de Belzunce-d'Arenberg.1 He married Elyssa Juliet Edmonstone, daughter of Sir Archibald Bruce Charles Edmonstone of Duntreath, 7th Bt. and Juliet Elizabeth Deakin, in 1999.2 He and Elyssa Juliet Edmonstone were divorced on 25 June 2013.2

He gained the title of Erzherzog von Österreich.1 He gained the title of Principe Sigismund di Toscana. He was given the name of Sigismund Otto Maria Josef Gottfried Heinrich Erik Leopold Ferdinand von Habsburg-Lothringen at birth. His marriage to Elyssa Juliet Edmonstone was annulled in 2016.2

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S130] Wikipedia, online http;//www.wikipedia.org. Hereinafter cited as Wikipedia.

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Guntram Maria Erzherzog von Österreich1

M, #111733, b. 21 July 1967

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Guntram Maria Erzherzog von Österreich was born on 21 July 1967 at Punta del Este, Uruguay .1 He is the son of Leopold Franz Erzherzog von Österreich and Laetitia Marie Madelaine Susanne Valentine de Belzunce-d'Arenberg.1 He married Debora de Sola on 13 April 1996 in a civil marriage. They were remarried in a religious ceremoyn on 19 May 1996.

He gained the title of Erzherzog von Österreich.1

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Elisabeth Erzherzogin von Österreich1

F, #111734, b. 2 October 1939

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=3.81%

Elisabeth Erzherzogin von Österreich was born on 2 October 1939 at Schloss Achberg, Germany . She is the daughter of Gottfried Erzherzog von Österreich and Dorothea Therese Marie Franziska Prinzessin von Bayern.1 She married Friedrich Hubert Edler von Braun on 28 April 1965 at Salzburg, Austria .

She gained the title of Erzherzogin von Österreich.1 Her married name became von Braun.

Children of Elisabeth Erzherzogin von Österreich and Friedrich Hubert Edler von Braun

Bernadette Edler von Braun b. 21 Jul 1966

Dominik Edler von Braun b. 21 Sep 1967

Felix Edler von Braun b. 23 Apr 1970

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Friedrich Hubert Edler von Braun1

M, #111735, b. 26 December 1934

Last Edited=29 Jun 2003

Friedrich Hubert Edler von Braun was born on 26 December 1934 at Regensburg, Germany . He married Elisabeth Erzherzogin von Österreich, daughter of Gottfried Erzherzog von Österreich and Dorothea Therese Marie Franziska Prinzessin von Bayern, on 28 April 1965 at Salzburg, Austria .

Children of Friedrich Hubert Edler von Braun and Elisabeth Erzherzogin von Österreich

Bernadette Edler von Braun b. 21 Jul 1966

Dominik Edler von Braun b. 21 Sep 1967

Felix Edler von Braun b. 23 Apr 1970

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Alice Erzherzogin von Österreich1

F, #111736, b. 29 April 1941

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=3.81%

Alice Erzherzogin von Österreich was born on 29 April 1941. She is the daughter of Gottfried Erzherzog von Österreich and Dorothea Therese Marie Franziska Prinzessin von Bayern.1 She married Vittorio Manno, Barone Manno on 7 May 1970.

She was given the name of Alice Marie Christine Margarete Antoinetta Josefa Rosa Helene Adelgunde Eleonora von Habsburg-Lothringen at birth. She gained the title of Erzherzogin von Österreich.1 Her married name became Manno.

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Vittorio Manno, Barone Manno1

M, #111737, b. 31 July 1938

Last Edited=14 Dec 2002

Vittorio Manno, Barone Manno was born on 31 July 1938. He married Alice Erzherzogin von Österreich, daughter of Gottfried Erzherzog von Österreich and Dorothea Therese Marie Franziska Prinzessin von Bayern, on 7 May 1970.

He gained the title of Barone Manno.1

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Maria Antoinette Erzherzogin von Österreich1

F, #111738, b. 16 September 1950

Last Edited=10 May 2003

Consanguinity Index=3.81%

Maria Antoinette Erzherzogin von Österreich was born on 16 September 1950 at St. Gilgen, Austria .1 She is the daughter of Gottfried Erzherzog von Österreich and Dorothea Therese Marie Franziska Prinzessin von Bayern.1 She married Hans Walter Baron zu Irmich on 29 May 1974 at Salzburg, Austria .

She gained the title of Erzherzogin von Österreich.1 She was given the name of Marie Antoinette Christine Josefa Rosa Margarethe Pia Angela Theresia Gabriele Isabella Ludnilla Zita Ruperta von Habsburg-Lothringen at birth. Her married name became von Proff.

Children of Maria Antoinette Erzherzogin von Österreich and Hans Walter Baron zu Irmich

Maximilian Gottfried Luitpold Baron zu Irmich b. 24 Feb 1976

Johanna Margarete Baronin zu Irmich b. 27 Jun 1979

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 367. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

Emanuel Alfred Leopold Franz Erbprinz zu Salm-Salm1,2

M, #111739, b. 30 November 1871, d. 19 August 1916

Last Edited=19 Nov 2005

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

Emanuel Alfred Leopold Franz Erbprinz zu Salm-Salm was born on 30 November 1871 at Münster, Westphalen, Germany .2 He was the son of Alfred XII Fürst zu Salm-Salm and Rosa Margaretha Karolina Isabella Gräfin von Lützow.2 He married Maria Christina Erzherzogin von Österreich, daughter of Friedrich Maria Erzherzog von Österreich and Isabelle Hedwig Franziska Natalie Prinzessin von Croÿ, on 10 May 1902 at Vienna, Austria .2 He died on 19 August 1916 at age 44 at Pinsk , killed in action.2

He gained the title of Erbprinz zu Salm-Salm.1 He fought in the First World War.

Children of Emanuel Alfred Leopold Franz Erbprinz zu Salm-Salm and Maria Christina Erzherzogin von Österreich

Isabelle Prinzessin zu Salm-Salm+ b. 13 Feb 1903

Rosemary Friederike Isabella Eleonore Henriette Antonia Prinzessin zu Salm-Salm+1 b. 13 Apr 1904

Nikolaus XIII Fürst zu Salm-Salm+ b. 14 Feb 1906, d. 15 Jan 1988

Cäcilie Prinzessin zu Salm-Salm+ b. 8 Mar 1911, d. 11 Mar 1991

Citations

[S12] C. Arnold McNaughton, The Book of Kings: A Royal Genealogy, in 3 volumes (London, U.K.: Garnstone Press, 1973), volume 1, page 376. Hereinafter cited as The Book of Kings.

[S36] Page 20. See link for full details for this source. Hereinafter cited as. [S36]
